alert.note: Alert for Darlington (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 6:46PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Darlington County through 730 PM EDT... At 645 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bishopville to 8 miles southeast of Goodale State Park. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lamar, Oats and Lydia. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 between mile markers 126 and 138. Interstate 95 in South Carolina near mile marker 146. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
